topics.body:
Speaking of which am I the only that thinks it's odd how popular being attracted to intersex people(umbrella terminology to cover everything like "shemales", traps, reverse traps, post-op, pre-op and such.  P.s. I don't mind whether or not someone uses the wrong term; I'm not like most people, asking people to remember hundreds of medical terminology is kind of ridiculous) but strangely enough people don't want to admit it?

Seriously. . . It's probably the most common fetish and the general populace doesn't want to admit it.  It's on par with how people don't like to admit they like sex in general.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b4debd63687262bd700000#post_53b4debd63687262bd700000
[bq="trashboat"]I remember reading some Porn Story where sex is so accepted that you could just do it in public and No one would care[/bq]
There are some places like this in the world.  It's just going to take a couple decades until it finally dawns on people how much humans like sex.  Either that or the current generation of internet dwellers will control the world when we grow old enough to be considered the norm.

The later will probably won't happen completely for at least two more decades.  Society will start culturally migrating towards the younger generation's views until the older generations no longer have any say.
